Game to create
-Tic Tac Toe-game involves a couple of players , a simple board
-checking for victory in a game loop
Assigment
Build a tic-tac-toe game on the command line where two human players can play against each other
 and the board is displayed between turns.
1)Think about how you would like to set up diffrent elements within the game.What should be class?
intance variable?Method?
2)Build game taking care not share information between classes any more than you have to

objective

The tic-tac-toe game can be played by two humans on the command line. 
The tic-tac-toe board is a 3 X 3 grid and players alternate turns until one player 
is victorious or the game ends in a draw. Players win by securing three consecutive positions 
on a row, column, or diagonal. The game ends in a tie if neither player has won 
and all positions on the board are taken.
